titleStmt.title: Almanzor and Almanzaida a novel / written by Sir Philip Sidney, and found since his death amongst his papers.
Almanzaide. English
titleStmt.author: La Roche-Guihen, Mlle de (Anne), 1644-1707.
Sidney, Philip, Sir, 1554-1586.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Magnes and R. Bentley ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Mlle. de LaRoche-Guihen. Cf. BM.
The bookseller's attribution to Sidney is erroneous.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
